title: About 2 Years Later Still No Full Time Twisted Treeline (OCE)

embed.description: @Riot - 3v3 / Ranked TT Update would be nice :) General Discussion

body:
(Old thread above take a look if you want to see the effort I went through to get the last update on TT OCE)

Reviving old thread from before boards.

Here we are in a new season & OCE still doesn't have full time TT.

Can we get a straight answer on this situation, where the hell is Full time TT &  TT ranked? Why do we have the shit mode of ARAM full time... a mode with 1 lane and random champ picks.. but we don't have a full time TT queue it blows my mind. 

You guys have Supposedly been collecting data  for the last 2 years.. so so what did you find out? Its too expensive? The 2 min queues are too long? WHAT THE HELL IS HAPPENING?

I'm tempted in transferring because I realize OCE in never going to get full time TT. Well that free server transfer was such a great deal. Free transfer to a 'beta' server so we buy transfers back after getting sick on playing on a lesser server, which has been in BETA for like 2 years.

Rant over, bet I am not going to get a reply took me 6 weeks of spamming to get the last one not sure I have the same amount of dedication this time.

Thumb this shit up if you want to help out the bros from down under :/

replies.body:
This is why Dota 2 is better. 

leave LoL and play Dota 2 i made the change 6months into waiting. i dont regret 1 day :)
